mapper.select: SELECT P.C_NAME, P.P_NAME, P.P_PRICE, P.PHOTO1_FILE, S.STOCK_SEQ FROM RHY_STORE_PRODUCT P, RHY_STORE_STOCK S WHERE P.P_SEQ = S.P_SEQ AND STOCK_SEQ=#{stock_seq}

SELECT SUM(AMOUNT) AS RESULT FROM RHY_MEM_POINT
WHERE ID = #{userid } AND RDATE >= date_add(now(), interval -12 month) GROUP BY ID

SELECT * FROM (
SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM +1 AS RNUM, B.SEQ AS SEQ, TITLE, SUB_TITLE, APP_CATE, FUNC, FUNC_NUM, FUNC_MEASURE, USERID, DATE_FORMAT(GDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS GDATE, DATE_FORMAT(EXPDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS EXPDATE, COUP_CODE, (SELECT IF( DATE_FORMAT(B.EXPDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') < CURDATE(), '만료', ISUSED) ) AS ISUSED FROM RHY_MEM_COUPON A, RHY_MEM_COUPON_DETAIL B, (SELECT @ROWNUM :=0) C WHERE A.SEQ = B.C_SEQ AND USERID = 'mhj' AND VISIBLE=1 ) RESULT
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM RHY_MEM_COUPON_DETAIL WHERE USERID=#{userid} AND DATE_FORMAT(EXPDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') > CURDATE() GROUP BY USERID;
SELECT * FROM RHY_PAYMENT ORDER BY RDATE DESC
